title: Furniture Craftsman
creator_credit: Edwin James Hipkiss and ERPI Classroom Films
brief_description: The work of designers and craftsmen in manufacturing “custom built” furniture. Pattern-making, laying out, band-sawing, power planing, joining, lathe turning, grooving, glueing, carving and finishing, as well as the relation between hand-tool operations and machine-tool operations are dealt with in detail.
